title: Bro Song Lyrics Server Sundaram
stanzas:
Poatukonda bro
single smile la
onnukona Â ottuvom

last benchu singam machi
kitta vandhaa seruvom
vaya vutta rendu punchu
naalu counteru poduvom

bro!!
Thamasu bro
time paassu bro
college kadavul
vachcha best
treatthaan bro!

canteenu bro
padhinetu bro
collegu faily taleu
entery gateu thaan
bro..

chittu nooru bro
strict-u sir-u bro
aasaiku speed breaker-u

lecture yaaru bro
suththa boru bro
cut adichaa theatre

kashta nashtam
kadhal modhal
kannukulla water-u
happiness-u rendu dosu
friendu thaanda doctor-u

bro!!
Thamasu bro
time paassu bro
college kadavul
vachcha best
treatthaan bro!

canteenu bro
padhinetu bro
collegu faily taleu
entery gateu thaan
bro..

kuraiyellaam orangatti
nallathathaan paakkum natpu
thaai thandhai varisaikulla
frienda vachaa enna thappu

bro!!
Thamasu bro
time paassu bro
college kadavul
vachcha best
treatthaan bro!

canteenu bro
padhinetu bro
collegu faily taleu
entery gateu thaan
bro..

seo.title: Bro Song Lyrics Server Sundaram
seo.description: Get the complete Bro Song Lyrics Server Sundaram from Server Sundaram(2017). Read the lyrics penned by Vivek and composed by Santhosh Narayanan and sung by Santhosh Narayanan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vivek, Server Sundaram(2017), Santhosh Narayanan, Santhosh Narayanan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
